mapper.select: SELECT QSM.PLNT_CD, QSM.SMP_MNG_IDX, QSM.SMP_DPS_PROC, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = QSM.SMP_DPS_PROC) AS SMP_DPS_NM, QSM.PITM_TYP, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = QSM.PITM_TYP) AS PITM_TYP_NM, QSM.PITM_CD, QSM.PITM_NM, QSM.ANS_TYP, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = QSM.ANS_TYP) AS ANS_TYP_NM, QSM.ANS_IDX, QSM.SMP_DIV_CD, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = QSM.SMP_DIV_CD) AS SMP_DIV_NM, QSM.MNG_SMP_VOL, QSM.SMP_STRG_MTD, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND DTL_CD = QSM.SMP_STRG_MTD) AS STRG_MTD_NM, QSM.SMP_VOL_UNIT, QSM.LOT_NO, QSM.BATCH_NO, QSM.INP_UNIT, QSM.MAK_DT, QSM.STRG_LMT, QSM.USE_LMT, QSM.IRG_YN, QSM.SMP_RMK, QSM.DPS_EXP_DT, QSM.DPS_FIX_DT, QSM.SMP_DPS_APR_IDX, QSM.DPS_REA, QSM.DPS_CANL_REA, QSM.RJT_UID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND USER_ID = QSM.RJT_UID) AS RJT_NM, QSM.RJT_DS, QSM.RJT_REA, QSM.DPS_YN, QSM.SMP_ETR_DT, QS.SUM_VOL, QS.REMAINS FROM QS_SMP_MNG QSM JOIN (SELECT QSU.PLNT_CD, QSU.SMP_MNG_IDX, QSM.MNG_SMP_VOL, SUM(USE_SMP_VOL) AS SUM_VOL, QSM.MNG_SMP_VOL - SUM(USE_SMP_VOL) AS REMAINS FROM QS_SMP_USE QSU LEFT JOIN QS_SMP_MNG QSM ON QSU.PLNT_CD = QSM.PLNT_CD and QSU.SMP_MNG_IDX = QSM.SMP_MNG_IDX WHERE QSU.DEL_YN = 'N' AND QSM.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND QSM.ANS_TYP = 'S0230004' AND QSM.SMP_DIV_CD = 'S0260001' AND QSM.SMP_DPS_PROC IN ('S0270300', 'S0270310', 'S0270500', 'S0270510', 'S0270700') GROUP BY QSU.PLNT_CD, QSU.SMP_MNG_IDX, QSM.MNG_SMP_VOL) QS ON QS.PLNT_CD = QSM.PLNT_CD AND QS.SMP_MNG_IDX = QSM.SMP_MNG_IDX WHERE QSM.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND QSM.DEL_YN = 'N' AND QSM.ANS_TYP = 'S0230004' AND QSM.SMP_DIV_CD = 'S0260001' AND QSM.SMP_DPS_PROC IN ('S0270300', 'S0270310', 'S0270500', 'S0270510', 'S0270700')
